name: CubedCubed
description:
Your computer is a portal to the world of CubedCubed, a 3D arcade-puzzler. Test your spatial reasoning abilities by controlling a cluster of cubes to squeeze through holes in walls; each success grows the cluster, earns points, and pushes you up the leaderboards.

Use the arrow keys change the camera view. Use the 3 keys to the right of the capslock key and the three above those (QWEASD on a standard QWERTY keyboard) to rotate the cluster. Use the spacebar to quickdrop.

Version 0.5.0 only includes the first five levels. Stay tuned for more!

CubedCubed is still in development, so older videos may not represent the latest version of the game.
